admin.add_group_instructions:
â• Add new group

To add a group:
1. Add this bot to your group as administrator
2. Send a message in the group
3. Forward this message to me

Or use command format:
/addgroup GROUP_ID "Group name" "region"
admin.error_add_group: âŒ Error starting group addition process
admin.addgroup_invalid_format: âŒ Invalid format. Use: /addgroup GROUP_ID "Group name" "region"
